definition: The term "gleichzeitig" refers to the state or occurrence of multiple events happening at the same time. It is commonly used to describe situations where two or more actions, processes, or phenomena are taking place simultaneously.

examples.german: Sie können nicht gleichzeitig sprechen und zuhören.
examples.english: You cannot speak and listen at the same time.

examples.german: Die beiden Veranstaltungen finden gleichzeitig statt.
examples.english: The two events take place simultaneously.

examples.german: Er kann gleichzeitig singen und Gitarre spielen.
examples.english: He can sing and play the guitar at the same time.

examples.german: Die Maschine kann mehrere Aufgaben gleichzeitig erledigen.
examples.english: The machine can perform multiple tasks simultaneously.
